ShadyArtificialShack2: Lamp oil, rope, bombs. You want it? It's yours my friend! As long as you have enough money.
ShadyArtificialShack3: I hear the King's looking for anyone suspicious, don't talk about me, kid.
ShadyArtificialShack4: I'm far beyond your years, you're all kids to me.
ShadyArtificialShack5: What am I? Just a shopkeep.
ShadyArtificialShack6: The twins looking for that 'special potion'? No? Shame.
ShadyArtificialShack7: Trinity is one mean woman, would love to see her at night.
ShadyArtificialShack8: Ever spoke to Penumbra? He's some kinda character.
ShadyArtificialShack9: Edelweiss is my contractor, best not to get on their bad side.
ShadyArtificialShack10: If you're not buying, I'm not interested.
